task: Design a power system for a single DC motor. Connect a 12V power supply to the motor. Route the wires from the supply terminals to the motor terminals, ensuring they follow the frame geometry.
expected_criteria: Circuit includes 12V PSU and DC motor. Wires are routed between components.

task: Design a dual-motor drive system. Connect a high-capacity 24V power supply to two identical DC motors in parallel. Route separate wire pairs for each motor and ensure proper grounding.
expected_criteria: Circuit has one PSU and two motors in parallel. Four wires total routed in 3D.

task: Design a basic conveyor drive. Connect a 12V battery to a high-torque motor. The wires must be routed along the underside of the conveyor bed to avoid moving parts.
expected_criteria: Circuit includes battery and motor. Wires avoid the top surface of the conveyor.

task: Design a vertical lift actuator. Connect a 12V power supply to a linear actuator motor. Route the wires with enough slack to allow for 50mm of vertical travel without tension failure.
expected_criteria: Circuit includes PSU and motor. Wire waypoints provide sufficient slack for movement.

task: Design a heavy-duty winch system. Connect two 12V power supplies in series to provide 24V to a high-power winch motor. Use 10 AWG heavy-gauge wire for the power path.
expected_criteria: Two PSUs in series, one motor. Thick wire gauge specified in assembly definition.

task: Design a rotating turret base. Connect a 5V power supply to a small gear motor. Route the wires through a central hollow shaft to prevent tangling during rotation.
expected_criteria: Circuit includes 5V PSU and motor. Wire waypoints pass through the center of the assembly.

task: Design a three-motor robotic base. Connect a 12V supply to three DC motors. Each motor should have its own dedicated wiring run from a central distribution point.
expected_criteria: Three motors in parallel from one PSU. Independent routing for each motor.

task: Design a cooling fan assembly. Connect a 12V PSU to a high-speed fan motor. Route wires along the outer shroud to keep the airflow path clear.
expected_criteria: Circuit has PSU and motor. Wires do not intersect the fan blade volume.

task: Design a redundant power system for a critical actuator. Connect two independent 12V power supplies to a single motor. Ensure the wiring from both supplies reaches the motor.
expected_criteria: Two PSUs connected to one motor. Dual wiring runs for redundancy.

task: Design a long-reach arm actuator. Connect a 24V supply to a motor at the end of a 500mm arm. Route the wires through internal channels in the arm segments.
expected_criteria: Circuit includes 24V PSU and motor. Wires are routed internally through arm geometry.
